text: aise kaise chalega evil demons ki tragedies ki reporting vaise hi nil lagti hai mujhe to aur Kisi bhi ek evil demon ki ek bhi Establishment jali bhi nahin abhi tak aur na hi Kisi bhi ek evil demon ka layoff hua hai abhi tak 1245n
Layoff ka toh aur bura haal hone wala Saare major players downsizing karre Baaki ek new war aur karwao Thoda aur mann Lage
